short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automate the setup process for your Omreader account.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically whitelist kindle@omreader.co in your Amazon.com account and allow you to select the Kindle you would like to receive your newspapers on.
